events: Started his art studies at the National School of Fine Arts of Peru
Influenced by art movements like surrealism and informalism
Moved to Paris to continue his studies
Developed his unique style influenced by the vibrant art scene in Paris
Returned to Peru and started creating abstract compositions
Became widely recognized in the art circles of Peru
His works were exhibited in major museums and galleries in New York
Was recognized as one of the pioneers of abstract art in Peru
